attributes.review: I don’t know why but there is a picture of a very saturated ra*ist on there, I was just trying to play movie star planet and when I opened it it took 5 weeks to load. Also bad things have been happening ever since I downloaded it, I’m actually now lost at sea because of this app. 😖
attributes.title: ATTENTION

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it glitched like u wouldn’t believe. It stole all of my data, deleted all of my apps, and took over my identity!!! It also was trying to get me to become racist and sexist with terrible propaganda “Trump 2020”!! Cannot believe apple would let this disgusting app on the app store please rethink this!❤️
attributes.title: gross and disgusting

attributes.review: i bought this app and it took over three days to download! then i was met with a threat that if i don’t vote for trump i’ll be exiled to china, even though i’m democratic! 😤 this app is very slow and buggy also! not to mention the hidden slurs throughout the app. never buying this app again!
attributes.title: AWFUL

attributes.review: This app rarely ever works for me. The first time i downloaded the app all of my other apps got deleted. #allappsmatter. Once i got all of my other apps back this one was deleted. Whenever i would go to use the app my data would not work. this app is not good do not recommend.
attributes.title: my review

attributes.review: Yea I went to the doctor and it turns out I have AIDs and many other sds that I am not comfortable listing and I know for a fact that this app gave me it. If I could leave a 0 I would and even maybe press charges. Can you press charges against the president? That would be cool.
attributes.title: I’m pretty sure this app gave me AIDs

attributes.review: if i could give this a zero i would. this was horrible! it took me a week to download this app and when it finally installed, it broke my phone! wiped it and deleted all my pictures. HORRIBLE! take it down! i just wanted to support our non-racist, non-homophobic, non-transphobic and non misogynistic president! is that bad?! IS IT!? Darnit.
attributes.title: THIS WAS HORRIBLE!

attributes.review: This app is terrible. It buffers the second you click on it. It supports a racist rapist and his campaign to yet again waste another 4 years in our government even though right now is the time for change. The app is overall ✨terrible✨I wish I could give it 0/5 stars😪
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: This app is horrible! Took 30 MINUTES to download which is unacceptable. And you being donald j trump I thought you would want this app to be perfect! This app is TRASH! It wiped my phone and took all my data. Now all my apps don’t even ask for my location because this app gave it to them!!!!!!!!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE!!! When I first opened the app, it literally threatened to kill me and make lil huddy🤴🏿choke me. 🙀🤬Then it showed me naked photos of some person with a little Cheeto twig!🤢🤮🤮 Then the next day some lady came to my house saying, is this? (my name) and I said yes, so then this lady pulled my hair and tried to strangle me, so then she pulls out a jojo siwa bow and pokes me in the eye. 😡🤬🙀 0/10 DONT RECOMMEND!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLEE 🤮😡

attributes.review: I wanted to get behind a good cause and all the sudden I must give my number to the opposite of what I’m trying to do? Just no! I don’t think this app is the right choice for anyone with at least half of self respect. I highly do not recommend this app I was just a horrendous experience..
attributes.title: Just no!
